details.description: Gentle browning
details.detailed: The Au Gratin function is great for browning dishes like lasagne, vegetables or potato gratin. The heat comes from the top, melts and browns the cheese on the dish.

details.description: Crispy bottom
details.detailed: The Bottom Heat function is ideal to finish the cake or quiche in order to add a crispy bottom.

details.description: Baking and cooking at one level
details.detailed: The Conventional Cooking function allows uniform cooking on one level at a time. Ideal for desserts, baking, cakes with moist toppings, soufflÃ©s, delicate gratins and roasting.

details.description: For convenient food without preheating
details.detailed: The Frozen food function is optimized for cooking and crisping convenience food like french fries, potato wedges, nuggets, chicken wings, crispy spring rolls, lasagne or gratins. Use the temperature and time proposed on the packaging instructions, no need to preheat.

details.description: Crispy bottom with even browning
details.detailed: The Pizza function uses Hot Air and bottom heat for a crispy crust and browned top on a single level. Ideal for pizza and quiches which require a lot of heat from the bottom. Reduce the set temperature by 20-40 degrees compared to a conventional function setting.

details.description: Perfectly risen, crispy and golden bakes
details.detailed: The Defrost function can be used for defrosting food. The defrosting time depends on the amount and size of the frozen food.

details.description: Gentle defrosting for further preparation
details.detailed: The Dough Proving function offers ideal humidity and heat which speeds up and improves the dough proving, prevents surface drying and keeps the dough elastic.

details.description: Optimized humidity and temperature for fast rising
details.detailed: The Dehydrating function creates ideal condition for optimized drying under a low temperature. Ideal for sliced fruit (e.g. apples, plums, peaches), herbs (e.g. basil, coriander, parsley) and sliced vegetables (e.g. tomatoes, zucchini, peppers, mushrooms).

details.description: For fruits, herbs and vegetables in slices
details.detailed: The Full Steam function is only using steam to gently and evenly cook ingredients like vegetables, rice, couscous, fruits and seafood (fish, mussels and prawns). This cooking method helps to preserve nutrients, vitamins, colours and improves cooking texture. Full Steam is only available between %s(Var_MinimumSetTemperaturePreSelectedOP,0)%s(Var_TempUnit) and %s(Var_MaximumSetTemperaturePreSelectedOP,0)%s(Var_TempUnit).

details.description: Continuous steam for healthy and flavourful food
details.detailed: The Grill function is ideal for quick grilling and browning of food. Great for steaks, sausages and crispy bread like toasts.

details.description: Even browning and crispy surface
details.detailed: The Turbo grill function combines Grill with Fan and is ideal to roast and cook larger meat joints and poultry with bones.

details.description: Roasting with allround browning
details.detailed: The Humidity High function combines high amount of steam with a little bit of hot air. It is ideal for delicate dishes like custards, flans, terrines and fish. Humidity High is only available between % s(Var_MinimumSetTemperaturePreSelectedOP, 0) % s(Var_TempUnit) and % s(Var_MaximumSetTemperaturePreSelectedOP, 0) % s(Var_TempUnit).

details.description: Combines hot air with Steam for delicate dishes
details.detailed: The keep warm function keeps the already cooked food warm in a constant temperature. The oven temperature regulates itself automatically to %s(Var_DefaultSetTemperaturePreSelectedOP,0)%s(Var_TempUnit)

details.description: Keep dishes warm to be served
details.detailed: The Humidity Low function combines a little bit of Steam with hot air. It is ideal for meat, poultry, fish, au gratin dishes, casseroles, roasted vegetables, pies, muffins, and biscuits. Meat and casseroles get a tender and juicy texture along with a crusty and brown surface. Humidity Low is available between % s(Var_MinimumSetTemperaturePreSelectedOP) % s(Var_TempUnit) and % s(Var_MaximumSetTemperaturePreSelectedOP) % s(Var_TempUnit).

details.description: Combines hot air with Steam for juicy and crispy food
details.detailed: The Humidity Medium function combines steam and hot air. It is ideal for cooking stewed or braised meat or roasted fish for a juicy and tender texture. It also works well for bread and sweet yeast dough giving them a crispy, golden crust and shiny surface. Humidity Medium is available between % s(Var_MinimumSetTemperaturePreSelectedOP) % s(Var_TempUnit) and % s(Var_MaximumSetTemperaturePreSelectedOP) % s(Var_TempUnit).

details.description: Combines hot air with Steam for gentle stewing
details.detailed: The Moist Fan Baking function is designed to save energy during cooking. The oven retains moisture in the cavity and runs in energy-saving mode. Follow the instructions in the cooking table of the User Manual. The oven door should at all times be closed during the cooking cycle.

details.description: Energy-saving baking on one level
details.detailed: The Preserving function preserves fruits under a low temperature. Ideal for berries, plums, pears, vegetables and mixed pickles.

details.description: To preheat plates before serving
details.detailed: The Steam Regeneration function reheats food with steam to prevent surface drying. Heat is distributed in a gentle and even way which allows to recover taste and aroma of food. This function can be used to reheat food directly on a plate like pasta, rice, lasagne, vegetables, bread and dumplings. You can reheat more than one plate at the same time, using different shelf positions.

details.description: For fruits and vegetables in jars
details.detailed: The True Fan Cooking function uses the ring heating element and the fan for an even heat distribution throughout the cavity so food gets evenly cooked on up to 3 levels. Heating up is faster and cooking is more intense so the set temperature can be reduced by 20 - 40 degrees compared to Conventional Cooking, saving both time and energy.

details.description: Gentle reheating maintaining humidity and taste
details.detailed: The yoghurt function is to prepare home-made yoghurt according to your personal taste. The milk is transformed into yoghurt through fermentation at an ideal temperature and for a specific time. The oven lamp will be turned off during this function.
